body:
Heh, [I once got one of my guilds to look like that](https://web.archive.org/web/20200930010700/https://ruqqus.com/+SomeGuild) by typing in an invalid color code. That's been fixed though, so now when you do that, it uses a default theme that doesn't have a colored line on the top of the menu bar.

<sup> - sfrohne [If you're going to post a screenshot of this comment, **don't** censor my username]</sup>
body_html:
Heh, I once got one of my guilds to look like that by typing in an invalid color code. That's been fixed though, so now when you do that, it uses a default theme that doesn't have a colored line on the top of the menu bar.

- sfrohne [If you're going to post a screenshot of this comment, don't censor my username]

body: How the hell did you manage to submit an invalid color code? Invalid color codes have always been rejected since the ability to type one in was added. I suppose you could've used inspect element but that was way before September 30. How are you able to magically get around the programming?
body_html: How the hell did you manage to submit an invalid color code? Invalid color codes have always been rejected since the ability to type one in was added. I suppose you could've used inspect element but that was way before September 30. How are you able to magically get around the programming?
